title: Foundational Analysis of Learning Environment Awareness and Preference Alignment

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: A teaching competency enhancement program for pre-service or in-service teachers. Foundational training to analyze student-centered environments when designing language learning processes for career preparers in medical/legal/technical fields

learning_goals: Perception levels of learning environment characteristics (visual materials, interaction modes, assessment types, etc.) can be measured on a 4-point Likert scale.
Preferences for each learning environment characteristic can be derived with over 70% response accuracy through survey items.
Based on the analysis of the alignment between awareness and preferences, learners can propose at least three improvements for the learning environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
